title: Riot's definition of a buff
body:
Fanbase: "Ornn's pillar spawns too late!"

Riot: Pillar now spawns 0.075 seconds faster.


....

god damn it riot, did you accidentally add an extra 0 to that?? lmfao.

replies.body:
a 0.75 reduction would actually reduce the time it takes to spawn by two thirds, which is pretty huge

0.075 would reduce it by around 6.7%
Yes, it is actually supposed to be .075 seconds faster.
